## Install and calling the package
```{r}
install.packages("ggplot2")
library(ggplot2)
```

## Defining a data frame and making a scatterplot

```{r}
df_shufol <- data.frame(x = rnorm(100), y = rnorm(500))

ggplot(df_shufol, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```
